    • Method Detail

      • buyInvestment

        public void buyInvestment​(java.lang.String symbol,
                          int quantity,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          double price,
                          java.lang.String investment)
        Sets the values of all the variables using setter functions and then adds the object to arraylist..
        Parameters:
        symbol - String,it is a unique symbol of stock investment
        name - String, it is the name of the stock investment
        quantity - int, it is the number of shares of a particular stock investment
        price - double, it is the price per share
        investment - String, type of investment

      • getList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Investment> getList()
        Returns:
        ArrayList, returns investment

      • checkSymbol

        public int checkSymbol​(java.lang.String symbol,
                       int a,
                       java.lang.String investment,
                       double price,
                       int quantity)
        Checks if the arraylist contains a particular symbol entered by the user. If found it updates the variables quatity, price, gain and bookValue.
        Parameters:
        symbol - String,is the symbol entered by user that he wants to buy
        a - int, another parameter, if we send 1 infers working on stock otherwise on mutual funds
        investment - String, type of investment
        price - int, price of investment
        quantity - int, quantity of investment
        Returns:
        int; returns 0 if symbol not found and 1 if symbol found and returns 2 if symbol found in wrong investment

      • checkSell

        public int checkSell​(java.lang.String symbol,
                     int a,
                     int quantity,
                     double price,
                     javax.swing.JTextArea memoDisplay)
        Checks if the arraylist contains a particular symbol entered by the user. If found it performs certain conditions and deletes if remaining shares
        Parameters:
        symbol - String, is the symbol entered by user that he wants to sell
        a - int ,another parameter, if we send 1 infers working on stock otherwise on mutual funds
        quantity - int, quantity of investment
        price - double, price
        memoDisplay - JTextArea, text area to output
        Returns:
        int; returns 1 if remaining shares are greater than 0; 2 if less than 0; and 0 if symbol not found or given quantity greater than original

      • typecheck

        public int typecheck​(java.lang.String symbol,
                     java.lang.String type)
        To check if symbol already present in a particular type
        Parameters:
        symbol - Sring, symbol of investment
        type - String, type
        Returns:
        int, 1 if matched 0 if not

        public void updatePrices​(Investment current,
                         java.lang.String symbol,
                         java.lang.String a)
        Traverses through the list to update new prices.
        Parameters:
        symbol - String, symbol of investment
        a - String, price of investment
        current - Investment, object

      • print

        public java.lang.String print()

      • getGainm

        returns variable gain
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        public double gain​(javax.swing.JTextArea getgainDisplay)
        Calculates gain by calling getGain function
        Parameters:
        getgainDisplay - JTextArea, area in which we need to display
        Returns:

      • searchPortfolio

        public static void searchPortfolio​(java.lang.String symbol,

                                   javax.swing.JTextArea memoDisplay)
